com.bbn.openmap.gui
Class UTMCoordPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.bbn.openmap.gui.CoordPanel
                      com.bbn.openmap.gui.UTMCoordPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class UTMCoordPanel
extends CoordPanel
implements java.io.Serializable

UTMCoordPanel is a simple gui with entry boxes and labels for Zone number and letters, and easting and northing representation of latitude and longitude. It sets the center of a map with the entered coordinates by firing CenterEvents.

See Also:
Serialized Form
